attributes.action: include  a tick box on the general election voting form which says " I do not wish to vote for any of these choices "
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would be a very democratic way of allowing the voting public to note their concern about the policys being pushed by the parties on the form and would stop protest voting to parties which are racist or do not have a chance of changing things.
